tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tokenized_assets (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name TEXT,
    shareholder_id INT,
    voting_rights BOOLEAN,
    token_balance DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE votes (
  vote_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  shareholder_id UUID,
  asset_id UUID,
  decision TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (shareholder_id) REFERENCES shareholders(shareholder_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES tokenized_assets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE voting_rights (
    voting_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    shareholder_id UUID NOT NULL,
    asset_id UUID NOT NULL,
    voting_power INTEGER NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (shareholder_id) REFERENCES shareholders(shareholder_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES tokenized_assets(asset_id)
);
